sources.full: Honourable Heroes; Higher CR Humanoids for Encounters

trait.name: Stoic Devotion
entries: The Afeera has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Fortune's Favor
entries: The first time the Afeera successfully hits another creature with a melee attack on a turn, they gain temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

trait.name: Leaping Gazelle
entries: The Afeera may make a single melee attack with their mace as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Speeding Comet
entries: As a bonus action, the Afeera can move up to 20 feet toward a hostile creature that they can see.

trait.name: Khassaki Kick
entries: The Afeera may replace their first mace attack on their turn for a shield bash or their second mace attack on their turn for an unarmed strike. On a hit, in addition to the damage, the creature is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

If the unarmed strike hits, the Afeera may make one mace attack against the same target as a bonus action; if the shield bash attack hits, the Afeera may make one mace attack against the same target with advantage as a bonus action.

trait.name: Astro Flip
entries: The Afeera can move 5 feet as part of a melee attack they make on their turn without using any of their speed. The Afeera can't move this way if their movement speed is 0, they are {@condition prone}, or are otherwise unable to move.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Afeera makes two mace attacks. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Gravity's Pull {@recharge 5}
entries: The Afeera chooses one Large or smaller creature it can see within 5 feet, the target must succeed a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. Large creatures have advantage on the saving throw; Small or smaller creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw.

On a failed save the creature takes 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, they swap places with the Afeera, are {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and are knocked {@condition prone}; the Afeera then makes one mace attack against the creature with advantage.

action.name: Orbiting Shield {@recharge}
entries: The Afeera throws their shield at one creature they can see within 30 feet, making a ranged attack roll. On a hit the creature takes 11 ({@damage 2d6+4}) bludgeoning damage and is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

The shield then ricochets and the Afeera may repeat the attack against another creature within 10 feet of the the previous target; it may repeat this way a number of times up to the Afeera's Dexterity modifier.
When the attack misses, or ricochets the maximum number of times, the shield returns to the Afeera's arm.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Afeera adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Afeera must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Dual Wielder
entries: The Aramusha gains a +1 bonus to their AC while they wield a separate melee weapon in each hand (included above), they can use two-weapon fighting even when the one-handed melee weapons they are wielding aren't light, and they can draw or stow two one-handed weapons when they would normally be able to draw or stow only one.

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Aaramusha can use their bonus action to regain 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

trait.name: Rock Steady
entries: Aramusha不能被非魔法手段击倒（%0%）。他们在对抗法术或其他会迫使他们移动的效果时也有优势。

trait.name: Rushing Wind
entries: 如果Aramusha向一个生物直接移动至少10英尺，然后在同一回合对其进行近战攻击，Aramusha在攻击卷上获得优势。

trait.name: Tempest
entries: If the Aramusha hits a creature with all four of their attacks on a turn, they may make one additional attack with their dual katanas against the same creature as a bonus action. If the additional attack hits, it is considered a critical hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Aramusha makes four melee attacks, two with their dual katanas and two with their katana in alternating order. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Katana
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Dual Katanas
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6})砍击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Smoke Bomb {@recharge}
entries: 阿拉木沙向地面投掷烟雾弹，它发出的烟雾在10英尺范围内形成一个严重遮蔽的区域。中等风（至少每小时10英里）在4个回合内驱散烟雾；强风（每小时20英里或以上）在1个回合内驱散。

reaction.name: Blade Blockade
entries: 作为试图对Aramusha进行近战攻击的生物的反应，Aramusha可以强迫他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。如果Aramusha成功了，他们可以对该生物做以下选择之一，并且该生物的触发攻击被废止。

items: {@b {@i Ring the Bell:}} The Aramusha makes a katana attack with advantage. On a hit the target is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.
{@b {@i Twin Vipers:}} The Aramusha makes a dual katanas attack with advantage.
{@b {@i Push Back Kick:}} The Aramusha makes an unarmed strike. On a hit the target is pushed back 5 feet and knocked {@condition prone}.

entries: 否则该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Aramusha在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，在他们的AC上加3作为反应。要做到这一点，Aramusha必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the Archer can deal an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the Archer that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Rush
entries: The Berserker can double their speed until the end of their turn. Once they use this trait, they can't use it again until they move 0 feet on one of their turns.

trait.name: Spin Chop
entries: The Berserker may make a single melee attack with their handaxe as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Dance of the Paired Blades
entries: If the Berserker successfully hits with all of their melee attacks on their turn, they may use a bonus action to make two additional melee attacks with advantage.
如果一个回合的五次攻击都命中，第五次攻击会造成额外的5({@damage 2d4})伤害。

trait.name: Head Slicer
entries: 如果狂暴战士在一个回合内的第一次手斧攻击成功命中，该攻击会造成额外的5（（%0%））的伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Berserker makes three melee attacks with their handaxes. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 6}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Bear Trap {@recharge 5}
entries: Berserker放置了一个{@item hunting trap|PHB}。

action.name: Fire Flask {@recharge}
entries: The Berserker throws a flask of flammable liquid at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 10 feet of the chosen point must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 12 ({@damage 5d4}) fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried and lasts until the end of the Berserker's next turn. A creature that enters the area during that time must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity save or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

reaction.name: Brute Force
entries: 如果狂暴战士在自己的回合中采取闪避行动后，近身攻击没有击中，狂暴战士可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次有利的徒手攻击，而该攻击没有击中。

reaction.name: Skilled Slash
entries: 狂暴战士在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在他们的AC上增加3的反应。要做到这一点，狂暴战士必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着近战武器。如果触发的攻击没有击中，狂暴战士可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次手斧攻击。

trait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: 黑袍人在对被害人（%0%）和（%1%）的救赎上有优势。

trait.name: Bulwark Stance
entries: The Black Prior can use their action to assume a defensive stance. Whilst in this stance the Black Prior's movement is halved, they gain +3 to their AC and may make one melee attack as a bonus action. Additionally the Black Prior regains 7 hit points at the start of their turn. The Black Prior can exit this stance as a bonus action on their turn; they automatically exit this stance after they take the attack action, multiattack action, use the Bulwark Counter reaction or if they are {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition stunned} or knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Harsh Requiem
entries: If the Black Prior successfully hits a creature with an attack on their turn, they gain advantage on their next attack against that creature until the end of their turn.

trait.name: Tenebris!
entries: 每回合一次，黑袍人可以用他们的盾牌撞击来代替他们的长剑进行攻击。一旦命中，该生物就会受到（%0%）的伤害，直到他们下一回合开始。

trait.name: Tower Shield
entries: Whilst wielding this shield, if the Black Prior is subjected to an effect that allows them to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, they can use their reaction to take no damage if they succeed on the saving throw, interposing the shield between themselves and the source of the effect.
Additionally if the Black Prior moves no more than half their movement speed on their turn, they count as being in half cover against ranged attacks whilst wielding this shield.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 黑袍人可以进行两次长剑攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})砍击伤害，如果双手使用，则为9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Umbral Shelter {@recharge 5}
entries: The Black Prior may use their action to choose any number of allied creatures within 30 feet. The chosen creatures gain 12 ({@dice 2d8 + 3}) temporary hit points.

reaction.name: Bulwark Counter
entries: While in Bulwark Stance, as a reaction to a creature attempting to make a melee attack against the Black Prior, the Black Prior may flip the creature over them. If the creature is Large or smaller they must succeed a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be moved to within 5ft. of the Black Prior on the opposite side to where they were, be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and knocked {@condition prone}; the Black Prior then makes one melee attack against the creature with advantage. Large creatures have advantage on the saving throw; Small or smaller creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw.

reaction.name: Crushing Counterstrike
entries: 当不处于防卫状态时，作为对试图对黑袍人进行近身攻击的生物的反应，黑袍人可以强迫他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。如果黑袍人成功了，他们可以对该生物进行一次长剑攻击，并且触发的攻击被浪费掉。否则，该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 当不处于防卫状态时，黑袍人在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，他们的反应力会增加3。要做到这一点，黑袍人必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: The Centurion has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Eagle's Fury
entries: If the Centurion moves at least 10 feet towards a creature and hits it with the next melee attack they make, they deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage to the creature.

trait.name: Incredibilis!
entries: 每回合一次，当百夫长以徒手攻击击中一个生物时，他们可以强迫对方做一个{@dc 15}力量救赎，或者被{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一回合开始时被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Infirmus!
entries: 百夫长对{@condition prone}或{@condition incapacitated}的生物造成额外的7({@damage 2d6}的伤害。）

trait.name: Lion's Bite
entries: 每回合一次，百夫长可以进行一次他们的角斗士攻击，攻击卷的惩罚为-5。如果攻击命中，他们会在攻击的伤害上增加+10。

trait.name: Lion's Roar
entries: 如果百夫长成功地抓住了一个生物，他们可以对该生物进行徒手攻击作为一个额外的动作。

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Centurion can use their bonus action to regain 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

trait.name: Gladius
entries: When wielding this weapon the Centurion can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action when they take the attack or multiattack action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Centurion makes three melee attacks with their gladius or unarmed strikes. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Gladius
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 7}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})穿刺伤害。一旦命中，目标必须成功进行{@dc 15}体质测试，否则将被{@condition incapacitated}击倒，直到下一回合开始。

reaction.name: Parry Counter
entries: 百夫长在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在反应力上加3。要做到这一点，百夫长必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着近战武器。如果在招架后攻击未果，百夫长可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次徒手攻击。

trait.name: Brave
entries: 征服者在对被攻击者的蓄力攻击中具有优势（%0%）。

trait.name: Brute
entries: 近战武器在征服者用它击中时，会造成一个额外的模子的伤害（包括在攻击中）。

trait.name: Full Guard
entries: The Conqueror can use their action to assume a defensive stance. The Conqueror gains +3 to their AC until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Conqueror regains 9 hit points at the start of their turn if they have less than half their maximum hit points and have at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Shield Charge
entries: 如果征服者至少向一个生物直线移动10英尺，然后在同一回合用盾牌撞击击中它，该生物必须做一个{@dc 15}的力量救赎，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Wind Up
entries: The Conqueror may use their bonus action to spin their flail, readying for a powerful attack. The next flail attack they make adds +5 to the damage rolled; they lose this bonus if they are {@condition incapacitated} or knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 征服者进行两次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4})重击伤害。命中后，该生物会被{@condition incapacitated}直到下一回合开始。

action.name: Pugno Mortis {@recharge}
entries: 征服者可以点燃一个黑火药炸弹，并向60英尺外的一个点投掷。在该点5英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 13}灵巧的救赎中成功，否则将受到10({@damage 3d6})的火力伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 如果不是全副武装，征服者在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在反应力上加3。要做到这一点，征服者必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器或盾牌。

reaction.name: Uppercut
entries: 当一个生物在征服者采取了完全守卫行动后，用近战攻击错过了征服者，如果它在范围内，征服者可以对该生物进行一次挥舞攻击。这就结束了全神贯注动作的奖励。

trait.name: Bamboozle
entries: 角斗士可以在他们的回合中用佯攻代替他们的一次攻击，用目标生物的智慧（洞察力）进行魅力（欺骗）检查。如果角斗士成功，他们在下一次对该生物的攻击中有优势。

trait.name: Bee's Sting
entries: The Gladiator may make a single melee attack with their trident as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: 斗士在对被攻击时有优势（%0%）和（%1%）。

trait.name: Cheap Shot
entries: 斗士在他们的回合中对一个{@condition incapacitated}的生物进行的第一次近战攻击自动命中。

trait.name: Fuscina Ictus
entries: 每回合一次，当角斗士用三叉戟近身攻击击中一个生物时，他们可以迫使该生物成功地进行一次{@dc 14}力量救赎，或者被击倒{@condition prone}和{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一回合开始。

trait.name: Skewer
entries: 每回合一次，当角斗士用三叉戟近战攻击击中一个生物时，他们可以将对手串起来。该生物如常承受攻击的伤害，并在下一回合开始前受到（%0%）的伤害。斗士在他们的回合中不再进行攻击。该生物在下一回合开始时，会受到额外的11({@damage 2d10})穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Standing Ovation
entries: If the Gladiator hits a creature with all four of their attacks on a turn, they may make one additional attack against the same creature. If the additional attack hits, it is considered a critical hit.

trait.name: Sucker Punch
entries: 每回合一次，角斗士可以用他们的斗篷而不是三叉戟进行攻击。一旦命中，该生物就会被（%0%），直到下一回合开始。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 斗士会进行四次三叉戟近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 6}击中，范围5英尺或20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害，如果用双手进行近身攻击，则为7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})伤害。

action.name: Buckler
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

reaction.name: Counter Jab
entries: 斗士在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，其反击力增加3。要做到这一点，角斗士必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。如果在招架后攻击未果，角斗士可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次扣手攻击。

reaction.name: Skewer Deflect
entries: 如果角斗士在自己的回合中采取闪避行动后，近战攻击没有击中他们，角斗士可以对发动攻击而没有击中的生物进行一次三叉戟攻击，并取得优势。

trait.name: Steel Will
entries: 麒麟在对{@condition charmed}和{@condition frightened}的蓄力投掷上有优势。

trait.name: Gryphon's Shove
entries: 麒麟可以在他们的回合中用徒手攻击来代替他们的第一次攻击。一旦命中，该生物会受到6({@damage 1d4 + 4})的重击伤害，必须成功进行{@dc 15}的力量救赎，否则会被{@condition incapacitated}推到下一回合开始前，并被推后5英尺。

trait.name: Dauntless Chase
entries: If the Gryphon moves at least 10 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with the next Bardiche attack they make on the same turn, they can force that creature to succeed a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is moved to within 5ft. of the Gryphon on the opposite side to where they were, is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and is knocked {@condition prone}. Large creatures have advantage on the saving throw; Small or smaller creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw.
If the creature succeeds the Strength saving throw the Gryphon stops adjacent to the creature.
这不能与 "强力漩涡 "或 "裂魂刀 "的特性在同一攻击中使用。

trait.name: Forceful Swirl
entries: 麒麟可以在他们的回合中进行他们的第一次巴迪奇攻击，目标是所有触及范围内的生物，而不是一个目标。
这不能与无畏追击或裂魂刀的特性使用在同一攻击上。

trait.name: Veteran's Kick
entries: The Gryphon may replace their third Bardiche attack on their turn with an unarmed strike. On a hit, the creature takes 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and must succeed a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and pushed back 5 feet.
如果徒手攻击命中，麒麟可以作为奖励动作以优势进行一次巴迪奇攻击。

trait.name: Soul Cleaver
entries: The Gryphon may make a single melee attack with their Bardiche as part of taking the Dodge action.
这不能与 "无畏追击 "或 "强力漩涡 "的特性在同一攻击中使用。

trait.name: Winner's Advantage
entries: When the Gryphon hits with a melee attack on their turn, their next melee attack deals an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Gryphon makes three melee attacks with their Bardiche. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Bardiche
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Stern Stare {@recharge 5}
entries: The Gryphon chooses one creature they can see within 30 feet. The target must succeed a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Draconite Bolt {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺伤害。命中后，目标30英尺范围内每个对麒麟友好的生物都会恢复5({@dice 2d4})的生命值。

action.name: Draconite Cleanser (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: 麒麟点燃并向60英尺外的一个点投掷一枚奇怪的炼金术炸弹。在所选地点10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 13}的灵巧救赎中成功，否则就会受到7({@damage 3d4})的火焰伤害。如果救赎成功，伤害会减半。
For the next minute, each creature friendly to the Gryphon that starts their turn within 10 feet of the chosen point regains 2 ({@dice 1d4}) hitpoints.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 麒麟在对抗一次近战攻击时的反应力上加3，该攻击会击中他们。要做到这一点，麒麟必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Rush
entries: The Highlander can double their speed until the end of their turn. Once they use this trait, they can't use it again until they move 0 feet on one of their turns.

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Highlander can use their bonus action to regain 8 ({@dice 1d8 + 4}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

trait.name: Dunmaghlas!
entries: As a bonus action the Highlander may enter an offensive stance. They gain advantage on melee attack rolls and may not take the parry or crushing counterstrike actions.
The Highlander may end this stance as a bonus action or after any Claymore attack (no action required). The stance ends automatically when the Highlander takes damage.

trait.name: Tír na nÓg
entries: If the Highlander successfully hits with both Claymore attacks on a turn while not in an offensive stance, they may make an additional Claymore attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Balor's Might
entries: 当高地人处于进攻状态时，克莱莫的攻击会造成额外的5({@damage 2d4})伤害。

trait.name: Caber Toss
entries: If the Highlander successfully grapples a creature while in their offensive stance, they may move the {@condition grappled} creature 5 feet to either side of themselves as part of the grapple, ending the {@condition grappled} condition, knocking the creature {@condition prone} and making them {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Formorian Kick
entries: While the Highlander is in an offensive stance they may substitute one of their Claymore attacks for an unarmed strike. On a hit, the creature takes 6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and must succeed a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pushed back 5 feet and {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Highlander makes two attacks with their Claymore. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Claymore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 3d4 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Bear Trap {@recharge 5}
entries: 高地人的位置下降了{@item hunting trap|PHB}。

action.name: Fire Flask {@recharge}
entries: The Highlander throws a flask of flammable liquid at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 10 feet of the chosen point must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 12 ({@damage 5d4}) fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

The fire ignites any flammable objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried and lasts until the end of the Highlander's next turn. A creature that enters the area during that time must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity save or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

reaction.name: Crushing Counterstrike
entries: 作为试图对高地人进行近战攻击的生物的反应，高地人可以强迫他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。如果高地人成功了，他们可以对该生物进行一次克莱莫尔攻击，并且触发的攻击被浪费掉。否则该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 高地人在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在反应力上加3。要做到这一点，高地人必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Deliverance
entries: When the Hitokiri reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on their turn, the Hitokiri gains 13 ({@dice 2d12}) temporary hit points.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Hitokiri regains 9 hit points at the start of their turn if they have less than half their maximum hit points and have at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Rei Sweep
entries: Once per turn, the Hitokiri may make an unarmed strike instead an attack with their masakari axe. On a hit, the creature must succeed a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Mugen-ryu
entries: When the Hitokiri hits with a masakari axe attack, they can make an additional attack against the same creature as part of that attack or multiattack action. The Hitokiri may make up to three additional attacks this way in one turn.
如果Hitokiri使用他们的Mangetsu Rift特质，Meikai特质或Senbonzakura行动，他们不会从这个特质获得额外攻击。

trait.name: Mangetsu Rift
entries: 每回合一次，Hitokiri可以进行一次他们的masakari斧头攻击，攻击卷的惩罚为-5。如果攻击命中，他们会在攻击的伤害上增加+10。这不能与Senbonzakura特质在同一攻击中使用。

trait.name: Meikai
entries: 当Hitokiri用masakari斧头攻击命中时，他们可以将masakari后翼攻击作为一个额外动作。
如果侩子手使用他们的Senbonzakura行动，他们不会从这个特性获得额外的攻击。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 侩子手会进行两次masakari斧头攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Masakari Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Masakari Backswing
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Senbonzakura {@recharge}
entries: 侩子手在攻击卷上处于劣势的情况下进行了一次masakari斧头攻击。如果攻击命中，将被视为关键一击，并造成额外的22({@damage 3d12})伤害。
Additionally if the creature is reduced to 0 hit points, it dies instantly.

reaction.name: Righteous Deflection
entries: 希托克里人去招架，并在他们的AC上增加4，以对付一个会击中他们的近战攻击作为反应。要做到这一点，Hitokiri必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。
如果在招架后攻击未果，他们会获得对非魔法的击打、穿刺和砍击伤害的抗性，直到他们下一回合结束。

trait.name: Against All Odds
entries: 如果蒋军15英尺范围内的敌对生物的数量大于同盟生物的数量（包括蒋军本人），那么蒋军和15英尺范围内的所有同盟生物都会获得相当于蒋军魅力修改器的近战和远程攻击的伤害加成。

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Jiang Jun can use their bonus action to regain 8 ({@dice 1d8 + 4}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

trait.name: Tough Discipline
entries: 蒋军在对{@condition charmed}和{@condition frightened}的蓄力攻击上有优势。

trait.name: Mighty Sanction
entries: The Jiang Jun may make a single melee attack with their guandao as part of taking the Dodge action.
此外，江军可以在进行躲避动作的同时进行一次徒手攻击，踢中目标的小腿。一旦命中，目标将受到{@condition incapacitated}的伤害，直到他们下一个回合开始。

trait.name: Twofold Slash
entries: 每回合一次，当蒋军进行近战攻击时，他们可以用他们的关刀进行一次额外的攻击，作为同一行动的一部分。一旦命中，额外的攻击会造成额外的5({@damage 1d10})伤害。

trait.name: Fatal Swirl
entries: 每一回合，当蒋军使用他们的关刀进行攻击时，他们可以使他们的攻击以所有触及的生物为目标，而不是一个目标。

trait.name: Sifu's Poise
entries: 蒋军可以使用他的额外行动来采取优雅的姿态，任何在蒋军20英尺范围内的生物，如果需要进行卷轴来充实他们的能力之一，那么在他们的回合中卷轴会自动成功。
蒋军可以在他们的回合中以额外行动结束这个姿态，或者如果蒋军移动或受到伤害，这个姿态会自动结束。

action.name: Guandao
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Fire Flask {@recharge}
entries: 蒋军向60英尺外的一个点投掷一壶易燃液体。在所选地点10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 14}灵巧的救赎中成功，否则将受到12({@damage 5d4})的火力伤害。如果救赎成功，伤害会减半。
火焰会点燃该区域内任何没有被穿戴或携带的易燃物，并持续到蒋军的下一个回合结束。在这段时间内进入该区域的生物必须做一个{@dc 14}的灵巧救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火焰伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

action.name: Inspire {@recharge}
entries: 所有在江君15英尺范围内的盟友，在他们的攻击和伤害卷上获得相当于江君魅力修改器的奖励，直到江君的下一个回合结束。

reaction.name: Dou Shi's Choke
entries: 蒋军在对抗一次近战攻击时的反应力上加3，该攻击会击中他们。要做到这一点，江君必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。如果攻击在招架后没有命中，江君会在将其击退5英尺前扼住该生物的咽喉，使该生物（%0%）直到其下一回合开始。

reaction.name: Dou Shi's Swirl
entries: 蒋军在对抗一次近战攻击时的反应力上加3，该攻击会击中他们。要做到这一点，江君必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。如果在招架后攻击未果，江君可以使用他的致命漩涡特性进行一次关刀攻击。

reaction.name: Sifu's Dodge
entries: 作为对试图对江君进行近身攻击的生物的反应，江君可以强迫他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。如果江君成功了，他们就会躲避到 "师父的姿态 "中，而触发的攻击就会被浪费掉。否则，该生物的攻击会正常发生。

trait.name: Punch Through
entries: Whenever the Jormungandr has disadvantage on a melee attack roll they make with their warhammer, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to the Jormungandr's Strength modifier (minimum of 0) if the attack misses but the higher of the two {@dice d20} rolls would have hit.

trait.name: Jotunn Gift
entries: 如果乔蒙根人成功地抓住了一个生物，乔蒙根人在下一次对（%0%）生物的近战攻击卷轴上有优势，只要该生物还在（%1%）。
一旦命中，该生物就会被推回5英尺，结束抓捕，并且Jormungandr会获得与攻击造成的伤害相等的命中点。

trait.name: Jotunn Farewell
entries: If the Jormungandr successfully hits a creature with a warhammer attack on their turn, they may immediately make an unarmed strike against that creature with advantage as a bonus action.
On a hit the creature is pushed back 5 feet, and the Jormungandr gains hit points equal to the damage dealt by the attack.

trait.name: Serpent Smite
entries: 如果乔蒙根人向一个生物直接移动至少10英尺，并对其进行近战攻击，乔蒙根人在攻击卷上获得优势。

trait.name: Hamarr Slam
entries: Jormungandr对一个{@condition prone}的生物造成额外的9({@damage 2d8})伤害。

trait.name: Hamarr's Favour
entries: 如果乔蒙根人用他们的战锤攻击击中了%0%的生物，他们会获得与所受伤害相等的临时命中率。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Jormungandr makes two melee attacks with their warhammer. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})重击伤害，如果双手使用，则是9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。一旦命中，目标必须成功地进行{@dc 15}力量救赎，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

action.name: Light Hammer
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 7}击中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。一旦命中，目标必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}体质测试，否则将被{@condition incapacitated}击倒，直到下一个回合开始，并被击倒{@condition prone}。

action.name: Twilight of the Gods {@recharge}
entries: The Jormungandr smashes their hammer into the ground. Each creature within 10 feet of the Jormungandr must succeed a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage, knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

reaction.name: Jotunn Grudge
entries: Jormungandr在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在他们的AC上增加3的反应。要做到这一点，Jormungandr必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着近战武器。如果在招架后攻击未果，乔蒙根人可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次徒手攻击。
一旦命中，该生物会被推后5英尺，并且Jormungandr获得与所受伤害相等的命中率。

trait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: Kensei在对被（%0%）和（%1%）的救赎上有优势。

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Kensei can use their bonus action to regain 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

trait.name: Swift Strike
entries: The Kensei may make a single melee attack with their nodachi as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Dawn of the Steel Sun
entries: 如果Kensei在他们的回合中被nodachi攻击击中，他们可以使用他们的nodachi作为一个额外的行动，进行一次额外的优势攻击。一旦命中，就会造成额外的5({@damage 2d4})伤害。

trait.name: Helm Splitter
entries: 每回合一次，剑圣可以用他们的鞍座攻击而不是他们的nodachi进行一次攻击。一旦命中，该生物就会受到百分之零点几的伤害，直到他们下一回合开始。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kensei做两个nodachi攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来取代其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Nodachi
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d4 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Pommel Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Inspire {@recharge}
entries: 所有在剑圣15英尺范围内的盟友，在他们的攻击和伤害卷上获得相当于剑圣魅力修改器的奖励，直到剑圣的下一回合结束。

action.name: Smoke Bomb {@recharge}
entries: Kensei向地面扔出一个烟雾弹，它发出的烟雾在10英尺的范围内形成一个严重的遮蔽区。中等风（至少每小时10英里）在4个回合内驱散烟雾；强风（每小时20英里或以上）在1个回合内驱散。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 剑士在对抗一次近战攻击时，会在他们的反击中增加3分。要做到这一点，Kensei必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: 京师在对被（%0%）或（%1%）的救赎上有优势。

trait.name: Aoarashi
entries: 京师可以在他们的回合中用一个刀鞘攻击来取代他们的第二个什锦刀攻击。一旦命中，除了伤害之外，该生物还将受到（%0%）的伤害，直到下一回合开始。
如果刀鞘攻击命中，京师可以作为奖励动作，以优势进行一次刀鞘攻击。

trait.name: Sajin-Arashi
entries: The Kyoshin may make a single melee attack with their shikomizue blade as part of taking the Dodge action.

Additionally the Kyoshin may instead make an unarmed strike as part of taking the Dodge action, kicking the target. On a hit, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Kaze Stance
entries: The Kyoshin can use their action to assume this defensive stance; if they have taken the attack or multiattack action on their turn, they may do this as a bonus action. Whilst in this stance the Kyoshin's movement is reduced to 5 feet, they gain +3 to their AC and may only take the Fujin Cuts action or the Tengukaze reaction.

The Kyoshin can exit this stance as a bonus action on their turn; they automatically exit this stance after they take the Fujin Cuts action, use the Tengukaze reaction or if they are {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, or knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Hikari to Kage
entries: 当京师在风姿状态下或作为粉碎性反击反应的一部分使用他们的shikomizue刀进行攻击时，生物在下一回合开始时将受到额外的5({@damage 2d4})砍击伤害，并且京师将恢复与该额外伤害相等的命中点。
这个效果的多个实例可以叠加。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kyoshin会进行两次shikomizue刀片攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Shikomizue Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Shikomizue Scabbard
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Fujin Cuts (Only in Kaze Stance)
entries: 京师对范围内的一个生物进行什锦刀攻击。如果攻击命中，他们可以对同一生物进行一次额外的什锦刀攻击，作为该行动的一部分。在一个回合中，京善可以用这种方式进行最多四次攻击。

reaction.name: Crushing Counterstrike
entries: 当不处于风姿状态时，作为对试图对京神进行近身攻击的生物的反应，京神可以迫使他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。如果京神成功了，他们可以对该生物进行一次shikomizue刀的攻击，并且触发的攻击被浪费掉。否则，该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Tengukaze
entries: 在风姿状态下，作为生物对京神近战攻击失误的反应，京神可以对该生物采取符咒切割行动，作为该反应的一部分。割裂行动的第一次攻击是以优势进行的。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 当不处于风之姿态时，京师在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，他们的反应力增加3。要做到这一点，京善必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Impaling Charge
entries: If the Lawbringer moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with the next melee weapon attack they make on the same turn, the target takes the attack damage as normal and is pushed back a number of feet equal to the remainder of the Lawbringer's movement speed, the Lawbringer continuing in a straight line with the target.

trait.name: Steel Will
entries: 执法者在对（%0%）和（%1%）的救赎中具有优势。

trait.name: Powerful Shove
entries: 执法者可以在一个回合内用一次徒手攻击来代替他们的戟攻击。一旦命中，该生物将受到6({@damage 1d4 + 4})的重击伤害，并且必须成功进行{@dc 15}的力量救赎，否则将被{@condition incapacitated}推至下一回合开始并被推至5英尺。

trait.name: Ruat Caelum
entries: 在挥舞长戟的时候，其他生物在进入执法者的范围时，会引发一次机会攻击。

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Lawbringer can use their bonus action to regain 8 ({@dice 1d8 + 4}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

trait.name: Swift Justice
entries: If the Lawbringer hits a creature at least twice with a Halberd on their turn, they can make a Halberd Cue attack against that creature as a bonus action.

trait.name: The Long Arm
entries: 每回合一次，执法者可以用他们的一次近身攻击来代替将目标翻转过来的尝试。如果该生物是大型或小型的，他们必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}的力量投掷，或者被移动到与执法者相反的5英尺范围内，被{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一回合开始，并被击倒{@condition prone}。大型生物在救赎动作上有优势；小型或较小的生物在救赎动作上有劣势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 法律使者可以进行三次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})重击、穿刺或砍击伤害。

action.name: Halberd Cue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击或穿刺伤害。一旦命中，目标必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}体质训练，否则会被{@condition incapacitated}击倒，直到下一个回合开始。

action.name: Igneus Imber {@recharge}
entries: 执法者可以在60英尺以外的三个点上点燃并投掷黑火药炸弹。在所选地点5英尺范围内的每个生物都必须成功地进行一次{@dc 13}灵巧救赎，否则将受到10({@damage 3d6})的火力伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Parry Punish
entries: 执法者在对抗一次近战攻击时，会在反应力上增加3点。要做到这一点，刷法者必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。如果在招架后攻击未果，刷法者可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次戟或戟尖攻击。

trait.name: Throne Guard
entries: The Medjay may make a single melee attack with its fan axe as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Stance Switch
entries: As a bonus action the Medjay may change the mode of their fan axe from a staff to a pair of one-handed axes or vice versa. The Medjay uses a different profile depending on the mode of their fan axe; additionally as a pair of axes the Medjay can make an additional attack as a bonus action when they take the attack or multiattack actions.

trait.name: Sunlight Strength
entries: When the When the Medjay reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, it gains a bonus depending on its stance:

items: {@b {@i Staff.}} The Medjay reduces any bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage that they take from nonmagical attacks by 3.
{@b {@i Paired.}} The Medjay's melee weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d4} damage.

entries: The Medjay may have both bonuses at the same time; these bonuses last until the Medjay finishes a short or long rest.

trait.name: Stoic Devotion
entries: The Medjay has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Moonlight Drain
entries: When the Medjay successfully grapples a creature while in Staff stance, they can immediately release the creature and reduce the creature's AC by 3 until the end of its next turn.
Additionally if when the Medjay successfully shoves a creature while in Paired Stance, the creature reduces all weapon damage rolls they make by 3 until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Scarab Relief
entries: The Medjay can use their bonus action to cause themselves and nearby allies within 15 feet to regain 6 ({@dice 1d6 + 3}) hit points if the Medjay is in Staff stance.
Alternatively when the Medjay is in Paired stance, they can use their bonus action to regain 12 ({@dice 2d8 + 3}) hit points.
They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Medjay makes two melee attacks with their fan axe. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Fan Axe (Staff)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Fan Axe (Paired)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Astral Manifestation {@recharge}
entries: The Medjay does one of the following, depending on their current stance:

items: {@b {@i Staff.}} The Medjay lights and throws a black powder bomb at a point up to 60 feet away. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. On a successful save the damage is halved.

{@b {@i Paired.}} The Medjay's throws spectral fan axes at one creature within 30 feet. Make an ranged attack roll with the Medjay's fan axe; on a hit the creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) force damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Medjay adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Medjay must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Nobushi can use their bonus action to regain 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

trait.name: Way of the Shark
entries: 当Nobushi使用他们的薙刀攻击时，该生物在下一回合开始时将受到额外的5({@damage 2d4})的砍伤。这个效果的多个实例可以叠加。

trait.name: Cobra Strike
entries: The Nobushi may make a single melee attack with their naginata as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Poke the Nest
entries: 如果Nobushi在他们的回合中用两次近战攻击命中，他们可以使用他们的薙刀进行一次额外的攻击，作为一个额外的动作自动命中。

trait.name: Jump Kick
entries: 如果Nobushi用薙刀攻击命中，他们可以在他们的回合中用徒手攻击来代替下一次攻击。一旦命中，该生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 14}力量救赎，否则就会被{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一个回合开始，被推后5英尺并被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Viper's Retreat
entries: The Nobushi may make a single naginata attack with their naginata as part of taking the Disengage action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Nobushi会进行两次naginata攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Naginata
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Fire Trap {@recharge}
entries: 诺布希设置了一个火灾陷阱，一小部分黑火药被易燃液体包围，在外壳上有一块压板。踩在压板上的生物以及5英尺范围内的任何其他生物都必须在一个{@dc 14}灵巧的救赎上取得成功，否则就会受到10({@damage 5d4})的火灾伤害。如果救赎成功，则伤害减半。
火焰会点燃该区域内任何没有被穿戴或携带的易燃物，并持续到诺布希的下一回合结束。在此期间，进入该区域的生物必须做一个{@dc 14}的灵巧救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火灾伤害。拯救成功后，伤害将减半。

action.name: Smoke Bomb {@recharge}
entries: Nobushi向地面投掷烟雾弹，它发出的烟雾在10英尺范围内形成一个严重遮蔽的区域。中等风（至少每小时10英里）在4个回合内驱散烟雾；强风（每小时20英里或以上）在1个回合内驱散。

reaction.name: Hidden Stance
entries: 作为对试图对Nobushi进行近战攻击的生物的反应，Nobushi可以强迫他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。如果Nobushi成功了，他们就会回避到一个欺骗性的姿态，并且触发的攻击被浪费掉；Nobushi在他们的下一次近战攻击中获得优势。否则，该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Nobushi在对抗一次近战攻击时，会将其作为反作用力加到3。要做到这一点，Nobushi必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Deadly Duet
entries: The Nuxia deals an extra 5 ({@damage 2d4}) damage to a creature they hit with a weapon attack if that creature and the Nuxia are not within 5 feet of another creature, besides themselves, that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Nuxia regains 8 hit points at the start of their turn if they have less than half their maximum hit points and have at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Hook Trap
entries: 每回合一次，Nuxia可以使他们的一次钩剑攻击成为陷阱。如果攻击失败，他们就会抓住目标，并可以立即以优势对其进行剑柄刺杀攻击。
然而，如果被困的攻击被击中，它不会造成任何伤害。

trait.name: Song of the Moon
entries: If the Nuxia successfully hits with all of their melee attacks on a turn, they may use a bonus action to move the last creature hit by their attacks 10 feet in a direction of the Nuxia's choosing that's no more than 10 feet away from the Nuxia.

trait.name: Crescent Step
entries: 努西娅可以在采取躲避动作的同时，进行一次刀柄刺杀攻击。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Nuxia makes three melee attacks with their hooked swords. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Hooked Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5})砍击伤害。

action.name: Hilt Spike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d4 + 5})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Deadly Caltrops {@recharge}
entries: 努克西亚人散布石膏以覆盖他们30英尺范围内的10英尺方圆区域。任何进入该区域的生物必须在一个{@dc 16}灵巧的蓄力动作上成功，或者停止移动并受到2({@damage 1d4})穿刺伤害。在该生物恢复至少1点生命值之前，它的行走速度会降低10英尺。以半速移动通过该区域的生物不需要做蓄力动作。
努希亚人对卡尔特罗普的影响是免疫的。

action.name: Infection {@recharge}
entries: The Nuxia chooses a creature within 30 feet to make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, for 1 minute, the creature and any allies of that creature within 15 feet of them at the start of each of their turns take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Thread of Fate {@recharge}
entries: Nuxia选择30英尺范围内的一个生物做一个{@dc 13}智慧救赎。如果拯救失败，该生物的移动速度将减半，持续1分钟。

reaction.name: Echo Strike
entries: 如果Nuxia在自己的回合中采取闪避行动后，近战攻击没有击中Nuxia，Nuxia可以对发动攻击而没有击中的生物进行一次有优势的刀柄尖刺攻击。

reaction.name: Mirror Raid
entries: The Nuxia adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them. To do so, the Nuxia must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses after the parry, the Nuxia may make one hilt spike attack against the creature that made the attack.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Ocelotl adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Ocelotl must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Ocelotl makes two attacks. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Macuahuitl
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tepoztopilli (Spear)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing or slashing damage in melee, or 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage at range.

action.name: Double Edge
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bear Trap {@recharge 5}
entries: The Ocelotl places down a {@item hunting trap|PHB}.

action.name: Death Whistle {@recharge}
entries: Each hostile creature that is within 30 feet of the Ocelotl and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the Ocelotl's Death Whistle for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Trapper's Reach {@recharge}
entries: The Ocelotl attaches rope to their tepoztopilli and throws it at one creature they can see within 30 feet, making a ranged attack roll. On a hit the creature takes 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, is pulled up to 30 feet towards the Ocelotl, is {@condition grappled}, and is {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn, where it takes an additional 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage. On a miss, the Ocelotl pulls their tepoztopilli back to them by the rope.

trait.name: Jaguar's Claw
entries: The Ocelotl may make a single melee attack with their tepoztopilli as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Jaguar's Grudge
entries: The Ocelotl may replace one or both of their attacks on their turn with an unarmed strike. On a hit, the creature takes 6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and must succeed a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and pushed back 5 feet.
If the Ocelotl replaces both attacks with unarmed strikes and the second attack hits, it deals an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Tonatiuh's Warpath
entries: If the Ocelotl hits with a macuahuitl or tepoztopilli attack on their turn, they may make one additional attack with advantage using the same weapon as a bonus action.

trait.name: Hunter's Snare
entries: If the Ocelotl moves at least 10 feet straight toward a creature and then makes a macuahuitl attack against it on the same turn, the creature must succeed a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Quetzalcoatl's Blessing
entries: When the Ocelotl reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the Ocelotl's speed increases by 15 feet and they deal an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage when they hit with macuahuitl, tepoztopilli and double edge attacks until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Huntsman's Spirit
entries: The Ocelotl can attempt to hide even when it is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

Additionally the Ocelotl can spend 1 minute while obscured this way to become {@condition invisible}. While {@condition invisible} this way their movement speed is increased by 15 feet. This invisibility lasts for 1 hour and ends early if they take the attack or multiattack action or if no longer obscured by natural phenomena.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: 每回合一次，军官可以对其用武器攻击击中的生物造成额外的3({@damage 1d6})伤害，如果该生物在军官的盟友5英尺之内，而该盟友不是{@condition incapacitated}。

trait.name: Officer Tactics
entries: 盟军的生物在对军官5英尺范围内的任何对它有敌意的生物进行近战攻击时有优势。

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Storm Rush
entries: If the Orochi moves 0 feet on its turn, they can take the ready action to perform a storm rush. This action is triggered when a hostile creature comes within 20 feet of the Orochi; the Orochi then moves up to half their movement speed towards the creature and makes a two handed Katana attack against it with advantage. On a hit, it deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage.

trait.name: Lightning Strikes Twice
entries: 如果八歧大蛇在他们的回合中用神刀攻击命中，他们可以用神刀作为额外动作进行一次有利的额外攻击。一旦命中，将造成额外的3({@damage 1d6})伤害。

trait.name: Zephyr Slash
entries: The Orochi may make a single melee attack with their katana as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The Orochi can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of their turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 八歧大蛇会进行两次神刀攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Katana
entries: {@atk mw}{@hit 7}击中或{@hit 5}双手击中，达到5英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})砍击伤害，如果双手使用，则是7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2})砍击伤害。

action.name: Kunai
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage. The Orochi can throw up to 2 kunai as part of an attack when they take the attack action; for each thrown above the first they add an additional damage die.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Nail Bomb {@recharge}
entries: 八歧龙放下一个钉子炸弹，一小部分黑色粉末被许多金属钉子包围着，上面有一个压力板。踩在压板上的生物和5英尺范围内的任何其他生物必须成功地进行{@dc 15}灵巧救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 4d4})的穿刺伤害。
未能通过灵巧救赎的生物在下一回合开始时会受到额外的10({@damage 3d6})坏死性伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

action.name: Smoke Bomb {@recharge}
entries: 八歧大蛇向地面投掷烟雾弹，它发出的烟雾在10英尺范围内形成一个严重遮蔽的区域。中等风（至少每小时10英里）在4个回合内驱散烟雾；强风（每小时20英里或以上）在1个回合内驱散。

reaction.name: Hurricane Blast
entries: 如果八歧大蛇在自己的回合中采取闪避动作后，近战攻击没有击中，八歧大蛇可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次具有优势的神刀攻击，而该攻击没有击中。一旦命中，该生物将受到（%0%）的影响，直到他们下一个回合开始。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 八歧龙对一次近战攻击的反应力增加3，而该攻击会击中他们。要做到这一点，八歧大蛇必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Cold Blooded Killer
entries: 维持和平者在对被（%0%）和（%1%）的救赎上有优势。

trait.name: Deep Gouge
entries: If the Peacekeeper successfully hits a creature with a melee attack from its arming sword they can make an attack with advantage using their dagger as a bonus action on the same turn.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The Peacekeeper can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of their turns.

trait.name: Sidestep Strike
entries: The Peacekeeper may make a single melee attack with their arming sword as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Stealthy
entries: 维和人员在为隐藏而进行的灵巧（隐身）检查中具有优势。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Peacekeeper makes two melee attacks with their arming sword. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Arming Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 8}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})穿刺伤害。一旦命中，该生物必须在下一回合开始时成功地进行一次{@dc 16}宪法救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 4d4})的坏死伤害。该生物在1分钟内的每个回合都会重复这一救赎，直到它成功为止。这个效果的多个实例可以叠加。

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8}击中，范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})穿刺伤害。

reaction.name: Deflect
entries: 如果和平卫士在自己的回合中采取闪避行动后，近战攻击没有击中他们，和平卫士可以对发动攻击而没有击中的生物进行一次匕首攻击，并取得优势。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Peacekeeper adds 4 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the Peacekeeper must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: 每回合一次，步兵可以对它用武器攻击击中的生物造成额外的2({@damage 1d4})伤害，如果该生物在步兵的盟友5英尺之内，而该盟友不是{@condition incapacitated}。

trait.name: Tower Shield
entries: 在挥舞这个盾牌的时候，如果步兵受到的效果允许其进行灵巧救赎，只受到一半的伤害，那么如果救赎成功，它可以使用其反应，在自己和效果源之间插入盾牌，不受伤害。此外，在挥舞此盾牌时，它被视为处于半遮蔽状态，以对抗远程攻击。

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺伤害。

trait.name: Close Quarter Fighter
entries: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on ranged attack rolls the Pirate makes with their pistol.

trait.name: Sea Wolf's Glide
entries: The Pirate may make a single melee attack with their cutlass as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Pistol Blast
entries: 每回合一次，当海盗使用他们的弯刀攻击命中时，他们可以立即使用他们的额外行动，用他们的手枪或技巧射击进行攻击。一旦命中，除了伤害之外，该生物会被（%0%），直到他们下一回合开始。
如果手枪或诡计射击的攻击对象是海盗用他们的弯刀攻击击中的同一个生物，那么它就有优势。

trait.name: Walk the Plank!
entries: 每回合一次，海盗可以进行一次他们的弯刀攻击，攻击卷的惩罚为-5。如果攻击命中，他们会在攻击的伤害上加上+10，并且可以立即使用他们的额外行动，将生物推到离自己5英尺远的地方。
这不能与海狼的滑翔特质在同一攻击中使用。

trait.name: Sea Legs
entries: 海盗在能力检查和抵抗被击倒的自救动作上有优势（%0%）。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 海盗会进行两次弯刀攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Cutlass
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6}击中，范围30/90英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Trick Shot {@recharge}
entries: 海盗进行手枪攻击。一旦命中，子弹就会弹开，海盗可以对前一个目标10英尺范围内的另一个生物重复攻击；这种方式可以重复多次，数量不超过海盗的灵巧修正值。

action.name: Pocket Bomb {@recharge 5}
entries: 海盗可以点燃一个黑火药炸弹，并向60英尺以外的地方投掷。在该点5英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 14}灵巧的救赎中成功，否则将受到10({@damage 3d6})的火力伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

action.name: Gundpowder Surprise {@recharge}
entries: 海盗向30英尺外的一个点发射一门手炮。在该点10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 14}的灵巧救赎中成功，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火力伤害，被推离该点10英尺并被击倒{@condition prone}。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 海盗在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在他们的反应力上增加3。要做到这一点，海盗必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Raider's Storm
entries: Once per turn, the Raider may substitute one of their long axe attacks for a Raider's Fury.

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Raider can use their bonus action to regain 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

trait.name: Rush
entries: The Raider can double their speed until the end of their turn. Once they use this trait, they can't use it again until they move 0 feet on one of their turns.

trait.name: Storming Tap
entries: 每回合一次，突击者可以用他们的长斧的鞍座而不是长斧进行一次攻击。一旦命中，该生物会被（%0%），直到下一回合开始。

trait.name: Stampede Charge
entries: When the Raider successfully grapples a creature, they may carry the creature and move up to half their movement speed forward before throwing the {@condition grappled} creature 5 feet in front of where the Raider stops, ending the grapple and knocking the other creature {@condition prone}.
Additionally if the Raider moved at least 10 feet towards a creature and attempts to grapple it, the Raider has advantage on their Athletics roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Raider makes three melee attacks with their long axe. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Long Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达10英尺，一个目标。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Pommel
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Raider's Fury
entries: The Raider makes a long axe attack against three creatures within reach that are within 5 feet of each other; one attack and damage roll is used against all three targets.

action.name: Bear Trap {@recharge 5}
entries: 袭击者的位置下降了（%0%）。

action.name: Fire Flask {@recharge}
entries: 袭击者向60英尺外的一个点投掷一壶易燃液体。在所选地点10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 13}的灵巧救赎中成功，否则就会受到12({@damage 5d4})的火焰伤害。如果救赎成功，伤害会减半。
火焰会点燃该区域内任何没有被穿戴或携带的易燃物，并持续到突袭者下一回合结束。在此期间进入该区域的生物必须做一个{@dc 13}的灵巧救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火焰伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 袭击者在对付一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，在他们的反应力上增加3。要做到这一点，突击者必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器或盾牌。

trait.name: Crazed Devotion
entries: 萨满在对被（%0%）或（%1%）的救赎上有优势。

trait.name: Rush
entries: The Shaman can double their speed until the end of their turn. Once they use this trait, they can't use it again until they move 0 feet on one of their turns.

trait.name: Raven's Claw
entries: If the Shaman successfully hits a creature with a melee attack from their handaxe they can make an attack with advantage using their kukri knife as a bonus action on the same turn.
一旦被击中，目标生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}宪法救赎，否则在其下一回合开始时受到10({@damage 4d4})的坏死伤害。该生物在1分钟内的每个回合都会重复这一救赎，或者直到它成功为止。这个效果的多个实例可以叠加。

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Shaman can use their bonus action to regain 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

trait.name: Wild Cat's Swiftness
entries: The Shaman may make a single melee attack with their handaxe as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Blood Trance
entries: If the Shaman hits a creature affected by their Raven's Claw trait or Raven's Beak reaction with a melee attack, the Shaman regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

Additionally if the Shaman successfully grapples an affected creature the Shaman bites them, dealing 12 ({@damage 5d4}) necrotic damage, healing the Shaman a number of hit points equal to the damage caused and ending the grapple.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 萨满会进行两次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 5}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})砍击伤害。

action.name: Kukri Knife
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 7}命中，距离5英尺或范围20/60英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Bear Trap {@recharge 5}
entries: 萨满下了一个{@item hunting trap|PHB}。

action.name: Fire Flask {@recharge}
entries: 萨满将一壶易燃液体抛向60英尺外的一个点。在所选地点10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 15}灵巧的救赎中成功，否则就会受到12({@damage 5d4})的火焰伤害。如果救赎成功，伤害会减半。
火焰会点燃该区域内任何没有被穿戴或携带的易燃物，并持续到萨满下一回合结束。在这段时间内进入该区域的生物必须做一个{@dc 16}的灵巧救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火焰伤害。如果救赎成功，伤害将减半。

action.name: Nail Bomb {@recharge}
entries: 萨满放下一个钉子炸弹，一小部分黑色粉末被许多金属钉子包围，上面有一块压力板。踩在压板上的生物以及5英尺范围内的任何其他生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}的灵巧救赎，否则将受到10({@damage 4d4})的穿刺伤害。
未能通过灵巧救赎的生物在下一回合开始时会受到额外的10({@damage 3d6})坏死性伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 萨满在对付一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在他们的反击上加3。要做到这一点，萨满必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

reaction.name: Raven's Beak
entries: 如果萨满在自己的回合中采取闪避动作后，近身攻击没有击中萨满，萨满可以以优势对发动攻击的生物进行一次库克里刀攻击，该攻击没有击中。一旦命中，目标生物必须在下一回合开始时成功地进行一次（%0%）宪法救赎，否则将受到10（%1%）的坏死伤害。该生物在1分钟内的每个回合都会重复这一救赎，或者直到它成功为止。这个效果的多个实例可以叠加。

trait.name: Winner's Advantage
entries: When the Shaolin hits with a melee attack on their turn, their next melee attack deals an additional 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

trait.name: Shadowstep
entries: The Shaolin may make a single melee attack with their steel-capped staff as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Flying Monkey
entries: 如果少林寺向一个生物移动至少10英尺，并在他们的回合中采取多重攻击行动，少林寺可以用他们的钢帽法杖代替第一次攻击，进行徒手攻击。一旦命中，该生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}力量救赎，否则就会被{@condition incapacitated}击倒，直到他们下一个回合开始，并被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Qi Stance
entries: If the Shaolin makes a melee attack on their turn, they may use their bonus action to enter a Qi stance. While in this stance, the Shaolin's movement speed is reduced to 5 feet. The Shaolin may end this stance on their turn (no action required); this stance requires {@status concentration}, as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell.

trait.name: Lotus Leap
entries: If the Shaolin makes a two handed attack with their steel-capped staff while in Qi Stance, the attack has advantage and deals 9 ({@damage 2d8}) additional damage on a hit.

trait.name: Sun Kick
entries: 如果少林寺处于 "气 "的状态，他们可以用一个徒手攻击来代替他们的钢杖攻击，并具有优势。一旦命中，目标必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}体质救赎，否则就会被{@condition stunned}，直到他们下一个回合开始。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Shaolin makes three melee attacks with their steel-capped staff. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove. They may also replace one of these attacks with Blink if they are able.

action.name: Steel-capped Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})重击伤害，如果双手使用，则是7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Blink {@recharge}
entries: 少林寺传送到一个在少林寺10英尺范围内的生物身后5英尺的无人空间，并以优势对该生物进行一次徒手攻击。一旦命中，该生物就会被{@condition incapacitated}，直到其下一回合开始。

action.name: Blessed Projection {@recharge}
entries: The Shaolin chooses an allied creature within 120 feet of themselves, they then teleport to an unoccupied space that is within 5 feet of the chosen ally.

reaction.name: Bounding Blossom
entries: 如果少林寺处于 "气 "的状态，他们可以在一个生物试图对他们进行近身攻击时作为反应，迫使该生物进行对抗性的灵巧检查。如果少林寺成功，他们可以对该生物进行一次钢杖攻击，并且触发的攻击被浪费掉。否则，该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Shaolin adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the Shaolin must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Shadow Deflect
entries: 如果少林寺在自己的回合中采取闪避行动后，有一次近身攻击没有击中少林寺，少林寺可以使用他们的钢帽法杖进行一次攻击，并对发动攻击的生物取得优势。

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: 每回合一次，军官可以对其用武器攻击击中的生物造成额外的3({@damage 1d6})伤害，如果该生物在军官的盟友5英尺之内，而该盟友不是{@condition incapacitated}。

trait.name: Officer Tactics
entries: 盟军的生物在对军官5英尺范围内的任何对它有敌意的生物进行近战攻击时有优势。

action.name: Broadsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Yama Uba
entries: 当神兵用草泥马攻击击中一个生物时，他们会恢复3({@dice 1d6})点命中率。

trait.name: Kusarigama-Jutsu
entries: 神棍使用的镰刀状武器是在链条上，末端有一个重物。当忍术师通过投掷他们的Kusarigama进行远程攻击时，作为攻击的一部分，他们通过链条将武器拉回他们的手中。
此外，神兵可以在用范围内的Kusarigama攻击击中一个中等或较小的生物后，尝试抓取一个中等或较小的生物，而不是造成伤害。如果抓取成功，神兵可以将该生物拉向他们，最多 15 英尺。

trait.name: Slide Tackle
entries: 神武者可以把冲刺动作作为一个额外的动作。此外，如果他们采取冲刺行动并向一个生物移动至少10英尺，他们可以尝试进行滑步擒拿。
该生物必须成功完成一个{@dc 16}的力量救赎，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}和{@condition incapacitated}，直到它的下一个回合开始。神武者移动到被攻击生物的另一侧。如果救赎成功，该生物不会被击倒（%3%）或被击倒（%4%）。

trait.name: Sickle Rain
entries: If the Shinobi hits with two kusarigama attacks on a turn, they can use their bonus action to make three melee attacks with their kusarigama. Each of these attacks deals an extra 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage on a hit.

trait.name: Nimble Attacker
entries: The Shinobi can take the Disengage or Dodge action as a bonus action on each of their turns.
此外，神棍可以在这些行动中进行一次Kusarigama或踢击攻击。

trait.name: Flying Kick
entries: 每回合一次，忍术师可以用踢腿攻击来代替草鞋攻击。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 忍者用他们的Kusarigama进行两次近战或远程攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Kusarigama
entries: {@atk mw,rw}{@hit 8}命中，距离5英尺或范围10/20英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。一旦命中，该生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 16}力量救赎，否则将被击倒{@condition prone}和{@condition incapacitated}，直到下一回合开始。

action.name: Shuriken
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage. The Shinobi can throw up to 3 shuriken as part of the same attack; for each thrown above the first they add an additional damage die.

action.name: Nail Bomb {@recharge}
entries: 神棍放下一个钉子炸弹，一小部分黑色粉末被许多金属钉子包围，上面有一个压力板。踩在压板上的生物以及5英尺范围内的任何其他生物必须成功地进行灵巧救赎，否则将受到10（（1%））的穿刺伤害。
未能通过灵巧救赎的生物在下一回合开始时会受到额外的10({@damage 3d6})坏死性伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

action.name: Smoke Bomb {@recharge}
entries: 神兵向地面投掷烟雾弹，它发出的烟雾在10英尺范围内形成一个严重遮蔽的区域。中等风（至少每小时10英里）在4个回合内驱散烟雾；强风（每小时20英里或以上）在1个回合内驱散。

reaction.name: Shadow Strike
entries: 神兵在对抗一次近战攻击时，会将其作为反作用力加到4。要做到这一点，神兵必须看到攻击者，并且挥舞着近战武器。如果在招架后攻击未果，神兵可以对发动攻击的生物进行一次草裙舞攻击。
如果神兵的攻击被击中，该生物在下一回合开始时会受到额外的5({@damage 2d4})毒药伤害。

reaction.name: Teleport Deflect
entries: 如果一个近战攻击没有击中神武者，在他们的回合中，神武者可以传送到他们所在的对面的生物的5英尺范围内，并以优势对进行攻击的生物进行一次近战攻击，而该攻击没有击中。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Shugoki regains 9 hit points at the start of their turn if they have less than half its maximum hit points and have at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Punch Through
entries: Whenever the Shugoki has disadvantage on a melee attack roll they make with their kanabo, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to its Strength modifier (minimum of 0) if the attack misses but the higher of the two {@dice d20} rolls would have hit.

trait.name: Rock Steady
entries: Shugoki不能被非魔法手段所击倒（%0%）。他们在对抗法术或其他会迫使他们移动的效果时也有优势。

trait.name: Hard to Kill
entries: If the Shugoki has less than half of their maximum hit points, they have resistance to all damage except psychic damage.

trait.name: Bonecrusher
entries: 每回合一次，Shugoki可以用他们的Kanabo攻击中的一个，攻击卷的惩罚为-5。如果攻击命中，他们会在攻击的伤害上增加+10。

trait.name: Headbutt
entries: 如果Shugoki在他们的回合中用第一次kanabo攻击命中，他们可以用徒手攻击来代替他们的第二次kanabo攻击。一旦命中，该生物就会被{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一个回合开始。

trait.name: Demon's Embrace
entries: 如果Shugoki成功地抓住了一个生物，他们可以使用他们的额外行动，在一个怀抱中压碎这个生物。该生物受到14({@damage 4d6})的重击伤害，被击倒{@condition prone}并且{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一个回合开始。在使用这个特性时，Shugoki会重新获得与所受伤害相等的命中率，并结束抓捕。

trait.name: Charge of the Oni
entries: 当Shugoki采取冲刺行动时，他们可以在另一个生物的空间内自由移动，只要他们是大型或小型的。该生物会被移动到离Shugoki 5英尺远的地方，并且必须成功地完成一个{@dc 15}的力量反射，否则会被击倒{@condition prone}。

trait.name: Brave
entries: Shugoki在对人的救赎上有优势（%0%）。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Shugoki makes two melee attacks with their kanabo. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Kanabo
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Smoke Bomb {@recharge}
entries: Shugoki向地面投掷一个烟雾弹，它发出的烟雾在10英尺范围内形成一个严重遮蔽的区域。中等风（至少每小时10英里）在4个回合内驱散烟雾；强风（每小时20英里以上）在1个回合内驱散。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Shugoki在对抗一次近战攻击时，会在反应中增加3的AC值。要做到这一点，Shugoki必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: 每回合一次，士兵可以对其用武器攻击击中的生物造成额外的2（（%0%））伤害，如果该生物在士兵的盟友5英尺内，而该盟友不是（%1%）。

action.name: Broadsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})砍击伤害。

trait.name: Vital Leech
entries: If the Tiandi has less than half of their maximum hit points, they regain hit points equal to the damage dealt when they hit with their dao attacks.

trait.name: Indomitable
entries: 当天地人下降到20点以下时，他们会获得18({@dice 4d8})的临时命中率。如果触发的伤害会使天帝的命中率降至0，他们反而保持1个命中率。
触发后，"天地 "在完成短期或长期休息后会重新获得该特性的使用权。

trait.name: Dragon Dodge
entries: The Tiandi may make a single melee attack with their dao as part of taking the Dodge action.
Additionally the Tiandi may take the Dodge action as a bonus action on each of their turns.

trait.name: Dragon Kick
entries: If the Tiandi successfully hits a creature with a melee attack from their dao they can make an unarmed strike with advantage as a bonus action on the same turn.
一旦被击中，该生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 14}力量救赎，否则就会被推后15英尺，被击倒{@condition prone}和{@condition incapacitated}，直到下一回合开始。

trait.name: Palm Strike
entries: 每回合一次，天帝可以用他们的道法进行一次徒手攻击，而不是用道法进行攻击。一旦命中，该生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 14}体质救赎，否则将被推后5英尺和{@condition stunned}，直到下一回合开始。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Tiandi makes two melee attacks with their dao. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Dao
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Battlecry {@recharge}
entries: 所有在天帝15英尺范围内的盟友，在他们的攻击和伤害卷上获得相当于天帝魅力修改器的奖励，直到天帝的下一个回合结束。所有在15英尺范围内的敌对生物必须成功地进行智慧救赎，否则就会成为天地的{@dc 13}，直到他们下一个回合结束。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 天地人在对抗一次近战攻击时，会在其反击力上加3。要做到这一点，天帝必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

reaction.name: Tiger Dodge
entries: 当生物在自己的回合中采取闪避动作后试图对天帝进行近身攻击时，作为反应，天帝可以强迫他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。如果天帝成功，他们可以对该生物进行一次道术攻击，并且触发的攻击被浪费掉。否则，该生物的攻击会正常发生。

trait.name: Rush
entries: The Valkyrie can double their speed until the end of their turn. Once they use this trait, they can't use it again until they move 0 feet on one of their turns.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Valkyrie regains 8 hit points at the start of their turn if they have less than half their maximum hit points and have at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Hunter's Strike
entries: The Valkyrie may make a single melee attack with their spear as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Spear Sweep
entries: If the Valkyrie hits with their first two melee attacks on a turn, they may substitute their third attack for a sweep with their spear against a creature within 5 feet. The creature must make a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw at disadvantage. On a failed save the creature is knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition incapacitated} until the start of its next turn.
如果这个生物没有救活，瓦尔基里可以对它进行一次长矛攻击作为奖励动作。

trait.name: Pouncing Thrust
entries: 如果瓦尔基里向一个生物直接移动至少10英尺，然后在同一回合用长矛攻击击中它，攻击会造成额外的4（（%0%））的伤害。

trait.name: Boar Hunter
entries: Once per turn, the Valkyrie may increase the reach for one of their spear attacks by 5 feet.

trait.name: Full Block
entries: The Valkyrie can use their action to assume a defensive stance. The Valkyrie gains +3 to their AC until the start of their next turn or until they take damage. However, the Valkyrie's movement speed is reduced to 0 feet and they can only take the Crushing Counterstrike and Shield Tackle reactions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Valkyrie makes three melee attacks with their spear. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。击中后，该生物必须做一个{@dc 14}力量救赎，如果救赎失败，该生物会被击倒{@condition prone}和{@condition incapacitated}，直到其下一回合开始。

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6}击中，范围30/120英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Bear Trap {@recharge 5}
entries: 瓦尔基里号下了一个{@item hunting trap|PHB}。

action.name: Fire Flask {@recharge}
entries: 瓦尔基里向60英尺外的一个点投掷一壶易燃液体。在所选地点10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 14}的灵巧救赎中成功，否则就会受到12({@damage 5d4})的火焰伤害。如果救赎成功，伤害会减半。
火焰会点燃该区域内任何没有被穿戴或携带的易燃物，并持续到瓦尔基里的下一回合结束。在这段时间内进入该区域的生物必须做一个{@dc 14}的灵巧救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火焰伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Crushing Counterstrike
entries: 作为试图对瓦尔基里进行近战攻击的生物的反应，瓦尔基里可以迫使他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。
如果女武神成功了，他们可以对该生物进行一次长矛攻击，并且触发的攻击被浪费了。如果女武神在上一回合采取了完全阻挡行动，他们会进行一次盾牌撞击攻击，而不是长矛攻击，完全阻挡的奖励也会结束。
否则该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 瓦尔基里在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在反应力上增加3。要做到这一点，瓦尔基里必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器或盾牌。

reaction.name: Shield Tackle
entries: 当瓦尔基里采取完全阻挡行动后，一个生物的近战攻击没有击中瓦尔基里，如果它在范围内，瓦尔基里可以对该生物进行一次盾牌撞击的攻击。这将结束 "完全阻挡 "动作的奖励。

reaction.name: Shoulder Pin
entries: 如果瓦尔基里在自己的回合中采取躲避动作后，近战攻击没有击中，瓦尔基里可以在优势下对发动攻击的生物进行一次长矛攻击，但没有击中。如果该长矛攻击命中，该生物在下一回合开始时会受到额外的9({@damage 2d8})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Varangian Guard makes two melee attacks with their battleaxe. They may replace one or more of these attack with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Bearded Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) slashing damage if used with both hands.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

reaction.name: Oathkeeper
entries: As a reaction to a creature attempting to make a melee attack against the Varangian Guard, the Varangian Guard may force them to make an opposed Dexterity check. If the Varangian Guard succeeds they may do one of the following options against the creature and the creature's triggering attack is wasted:

items: {@b {@i Hjaldr:}} The Varangian Guard makes a bearded axe attack; on a hit all allied creatures within 15 feet gain temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.
{@b {@i Aesir:}} The Varangian Guard makes a bearded axe attack with advantage.
{@b {@i Smite:}} The Varangian Guard makes a shield bash attack. On a hit the target is pushed back 10 feet and {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

entries: 否则该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The Varangian Guard adds 3 to their AC against one melee attack that would hit them as a reaction. To do so, the Varangian Guard must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

trait.name: Aesir Fury
entries: If the Varangian Guard successfully hits a creature with an attack on their turn, they gain advantage on their next attack against that creature until the end of their turn.

trait.name: Misthia Ward
entries: The first time the Varangian Guard successfully hits another creature with a melee attack on a turn, they gain temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt.

trait.name: Aesir Aura
entries: If the Varangian Guard hits a creature with both its melee attacks on its turn, the Varangian Guard and all allied creatures within 15 feet gain a bonus to their weapon damage rolls equal to the Varangian Guard's Charisma modifier until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Aesir Bind
entries: When the Varangian Guard hits a creature with its battleaxe on its turn, the creature must succeed a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the the end of the Varangian Guard's turn.

trait.name: Sellsword's Smite
entries: If the Varangian Guard hits a creature with both its melee attacks on its turn, they can make an unarmed strike against it as a bonus action. On a hit, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and must succeed a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and pushed back 5 feet.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Varangian Guard regains 9 hit points at the start of their turn if they have less than half their maximum hit points and have at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Brave
entries: 典狱长在对被攻击者的救赎上有优势（%0%）。

trait.name: Half-Swording
entries: 典狱长能够在手持长剑的情况下抓取生物，就像他们有一只手一样。此外，当他们做出抓取或推搡动作时，他们在相关的力量卷轴上有优势。

trait.name: Shoulder Bash
entries: 如果典狱长在其回合内用近战武器击中一个生物至少两次，他们可以对其进行推挤攻击作为一个额外动作。

trait.name: Second Wind
entries: The Warden can use their bonus action to regain 7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) hit points. They regain the use of this ability after finishing a short or long rest.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 典狱长会进行三次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，距离5英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})重击、穿刺或切割伤害，如果双手使用，则有8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})重击、穿刺或切割伤害。

action.name: Inspire {@recharge}
entries: 在典狱长15英尺范围内的所有盟友都会在他们的攻击和伤害卷上获得相当于典狱长魅力修改器的奖励，直到典狱长的下一个回合结束。

action.name: Pugno Mortis {@recharge}
entries: 典狱长可以点燃一个黑火药炸弹，并向60英尺以外的地方投掷。在该点5英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 13}灵巧的救赎中成功，否则就会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火焰伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Crushing Counterstrike
entries: 作为对试图对典狱长进行近身攻击的生物的反应，典狱长可以强迫他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。如果典狱长成功了，他们可以对该生物进行一次近战攻击，而触发的攻击则被浪费了。否则，该生物的攻击会正常发生。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 典狱长在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，会在他们的反应力上增加3。要做到这一点，典狱长必须看到攻击者并挥舞着近战武器。

trait.name: Rush
entries: The Warlord can double their speed until the end of their turn. Once they use this trait, they can't use it again until they move 0 feet on one of their turns.

trait.name: Headsplitter Leap
entries: If the Warlord moves at least 5 feet straight towards a creature and hits it with their first melee attack on a turn, they may substitute their second melee attack with an attempt to headbutt a creature.
如果该生物是大型或较小的，他们必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}宪法救赎，否则就会被{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一个回合开始。然后战神可以用他们的剑作为奖励动作进行攻击。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Warlord regains 9 hit points at the start of their turn if they have less than half their maximum hit points and have at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Full Guard
entries: The Warlord can use their action to assume a defensive stance. The Warlord gains +3 to their AC until the start of their next turn. Whilst in Full Guard the Warlord may make one melee attack as a bonus action

trait.name: Crashing Charge
entries: If the Warlord moves at least 10 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a shield bash on the same turn, they can force that creature to succeed a {@dc 15} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice). On a failed save the creature is pushed back as far as the Warlord continues to move, up to the Warlord's remaining movement speed.
如果该生物成功地进行了力量救赎，战神就会在该生物附近停下来。如果该生物成功地进行了灵巧救赎，战神将继续在该生物身边移动10英尺，然后停止。

trait.name: Punch Through
entries: Whenever the Warlord has disadvantage on a melee attack roll they make with their Ulfberht Sword, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to the Warlord's Strength modifier (minimum of 0) if the attack misses but the higher of the two {@dice d20} rolls would have hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 战神会进行两次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Ulfberht Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4})穿刺伤害。

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})重击伤害。

action.name: Bear Trap {@recharge 5}
entries: 战神放下了一个狩猎的陷阱。

action.name: Fire Flask {@recharge}
entries: 战神将一壶易燃液体抛向60英尺外的一个点。在所选地点10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个{@dc 12}的灵巧救赎中成功，否则就会受到12({@damage 5d4})的火焰伤害。如果救赎成功，伤害会减半。
火焰会点燃该区域内任何没有被穿戴或携带的易燃物，并持续到战神的下一回合结束。在此期间，进入该区域的生物必须做一个{@dc 12}的灵巧救赎，否则会受到10({@damage 3d6})的火焰伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

reaction.name: Headbutt Riposte
entries: 当一个生物在战神采取了完全守卫行动后，用近战攻击错过了战神，战神可以尝试用头撞向一个生物。
如果该生物是大型或较小的，他们必须成功地进行一次{@dc 15}宪法救赎，否则就会被{@condition incapacitated}，直到他们下一个回合开始。然后，战神可以用他们的剑进行一次攻击，作为这个反应的一部分。这就结束了全副武装行动的奖励。

reaction.name: Shield Counter
entries: 如果不在全副武装状态下，战神在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时的反应力上增加3。要做到这一点，战神必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着盾牌。如果在盾牌反击后攻击未果，战神可以用他们的剑对发动攻击的生物进行一次近战攻击，作为该反应的一部分。

trait.name: Beast of Prey
entries: The Warmonger may make either a single two-handed melee attack with advantage using their flamberge bastard sword or a single clawed gauntlet attack as part of taking the Dodge action.

trait.name: Corrupted Blade
entries: 暖男使用他们的额外行动，给他们的长剑涂上腐蚀能量。下一次，当暖男用私生子剑攻击一个生物时，该生物必须成功地进行一次{@dc 14}宪法救赎，否则就会受到腐蚀的影响。

On a failed save, for 1 minute, the creature and any allies of that creature within 15 feet of them at the start of each of their turns take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) necrotic damage. At the end of each of its turns the creature repeats the saving throw, ending the corruption early on a success.

trait.name: Dark Devotion
entries: 暖男在对被（%0%）或（%1%）的救赎上有优势。

trait.name: Elixir of Corruption
entries: 当暖男用近战攻击击中一个受腐败影响的生物时，他们会恢复5（（%0%））的命中率。

trait.name: Power of Corruption
entries: 当暖男用近战攻击击中受腐败影响的生物时，他们会造成额外的5({@damage 2d4})坏死伤害。

trait.name: Preying Claw
entries: Once per turn, when the Warmonger hits a creature with a clawed gauntlet attack they can force them to make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn and the Warmonger may use their bonus action to make a flamberge bastard sword attack against the same creature that automatically hits.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 战士可以进行三次近战攻击。他们可以用抓取或推搡来代替其中的一次或多次攻击。

action.name: Flamberge Bastard Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4})砍击伤害，如果双手使用，则为11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})砍击伤害。

action.name: Clawed Gauntlet
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage. On a hit, the creature takes an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage at the start of their next turn. Multiple instances of this effect stack.

action.name: Corruption Blast {@recharge}
entries: Each hostile creature within 15 feet of the Warmonger must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, for 1 minute, the creature and any allies of that creature within 15 feet of them at the start of each of their turns take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) necrotic damage. At the end of each of its turns, the creature repeats the saving throw ending the corruption early on a success.

reaction.name: Impaling Riposte
entries: 暖男在对抗一次会击中他们的近战攻击时，他们的反应力增加3。要做到这一点，暖男必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着近战武器。
如果攻击没有命中，暖男可以以优势对发动攻击的生物进行一次法兰西私生子剑攻击。一旦命中，目标就会受到正常的攻击伤害，并被推后10英尺，暖男跟随目标。
如果没有空间让目标被推回，他们反而会被击倒（%0%），并从暖男的爪子中受到额外的6（{@damage 1d4 + 4}）的砍伤。

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: 詹虎的先天法术能力是智力（法术保存（%0%），法术攻击命中率+6）。他们可以先天性地施展以下法术，不需要任何组件。

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The Zhanhu regains 8 hit points at the start of their turn if they have less than half their maximum hit points and have at least 1 hit point.

trait.name: Winner's Advantage
entries: When the Zhanhu hits with a melee attack on their turn, their next melee attack deals an additional 5 ({@damage 2d4}) damage.

trait.name: Absolute Amplitude
entries: 每回合一次，当展虎使用他们的长道进行攻击时，他们可以使该攻击针对所有在其范围内的生物，而不是一个目标。

trait.name: Violent Maneuver
entries: 斩虎可以用他们的长道进行一次近战攻击，作为采取躲避行动的一部分。
Additionally the Zhanhu may take the Dodge action as a bonus action on each of their turns.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Zhanhu makes two melee attacks with their changdao. They may replace one or more of these attacks with a grapple or shove.

action.name: Changdao
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}10 ({@damage 3d4 + 3})砍击伤害。

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6}击中，到达5英尺，一个目标。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})重击伤害。

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6}击中，范围150/600英尺，一个目标。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})穿刺伤害。

reaction.name: Parry
entries: 斩虎在对抗一次近战攻击时，会将其作为反作用力加到3。要做到这一点，展虎必须看到攻击者并且挥舞着近战武器。

reaction.name: Subduing Counterblow
entries: 当一个生物在他们的回合中采取了闪避动作之后，试图对展虎进行近身攻击，作为反应，展虎可以强迫他们进行对抗性的灵巧检查。如果展虎成功了，他们可以对该生物进行一次徒手攻击，并且触发的攻击会被浪费掉；如果被击中，该生物会被（%0%），直到下一回合开始。否则该生物的攻击会正常发生。

entries.name: Special
entries: 戴上或脱下这个手套状的武器需要一个动作，你可以用同一只手握住另一个物体。在戴上盔甲的情况下，徒手攻击会造成{@damage 1d4}的重击伤害。

entries.name: Special
entries: 挥舞这把武器时，你可以在采取攻击行动时将一次徒手攻击作为额外行动。

entries.name: Special
entries: 你需要有15分以上的力量值才能有效地使用这把武器，否则你的攻击就有劣势。

entries.name: Special
entries: 你需要有17分或更高的力量值才能有效地使用这把武器，否则你的攻击将处于劣势。

entries.name: Special
entries: 当单手挥舞时，该武器获得了精巧的属性。

entries.name: Special
entries: 当你用此武器攻击命中时，你可以作为额外动作进行另一次攻击。但是它在击中时造成{@damage 1d8}的伤害，而不是{@damage 1d12}。

entries.name: Special
entries: 每回合一次，你可以用此武器的一次攻击作为陷阱。如果攻击失败，你可以抓住目标，并可以立即以优势对其进行枪柄刺杀攻击。该攻击在命中时造成{@damage 1d4}的穿刺伤害。
然而，如果被困的攻击被击中，它不会造成任何伤害。

entries.name: Special
entries: 这种类似镰刀的武器有一条链条，末端有一个重物。当你通过投掷Kusarigama来进行远程攻击时，你可以通过链条将武器拉回你的手中，作为攻击的一部分。

entries.name: Special
entries: 在挥舞这把武器的时候，你可以用你的反应将你的熟练度加到你的攻击力上，以对抗一次会击中你的近战攻击；要这样做，你必须看到攻击者并且正在挥舞这把武器。

entries.name: Special
entries: 这把剑的剑鞘也可以作为武器使用；当你两只手都拿着shikomizue和它的剑鞘时，它们被视为轻型武器。击中后，剑鞘会造成{@damage 1d6}的重击伤害。

entries.name: Special
entries: As a bonus action you can split the staff into two one-handed axe weapons that have the light property and deal {@damage 1d6} slashing damage on a hit; the staff can be reconnected again as a bonus action.

baseitem.name: Macuahuitl
entries: A wooden club lined with prismatic blades of obsidian, capable of producing an edge sharper than high-quality steel razor blades, as such these weapons can cause serious lacerations.

entries.name: Special
entries: On a hit, this weapon deals an additional {@damage 1d4} slashing damage.

entries.name: Special
entries: 当你采取攻击行动时，你可以抽出并投掷最多2个Kunai作为攻击的一部分；每投掷一个高于第一个的Kunai，你就增加一个额外的伤害模子。

entries.name: Special
entries: 当你采取攻击行动时，你最多可以拔出3个shuriken作为攻击的一部分；每扔出一个高于第一个的shuriken，你都会增加一个额外的伤害模子。

baseitem.name: Plated Chainmail
entries: 电镀链甲由互锁的金属环和金属板段组成，包括一层穿在衣服下面的绗缝织物，以防止摩擦，并缓冲与穿在身体较大平面部分的金属板的撞击。该套装包括护手和护膝。

entries.name: Special
entries: When wearing this armor, you can add 1 to your AC if you have a Dexterity of 12 or higher.

baseitem.name: Segmented Plate
entries: 这种盔甲包括一个合身的金属胸件，与柔软的皮革一起穿在身上，还有头盔、护手、铠甲和脚蹼。虽然它使关节相对不受保护，但这种盔甲为穿戴者的重要器官提供了良好的保护，同时使穿戴者相对没有负担，只要他们有足够的力量来承受其重量。

entries.name: Special
entries: 穿着这件盔甲时，如果你的灵巧度达到16或更高，你可以在你的AC上增加3，而不是2。
如果穿戴者的力量值低于13，他们的速度会减少10英尺。

baseitem.name: Wooden cuirass
entries: 这种盔甲包括一个合身的木质胸甲，与柔软的皮革一起穿在身上，还有头盔、护手、铠甲和护膝；有些变体的特点是用木条来加固。虽然它使关节相对不受保护，但这种盔甲为穿戴者的重要器官提供了良好的保护，同时由于其轻质材料，穿戴者相对不受约束。

baseitem.name: Metal cuirass
entries: Metal cuirasses consist of several large shaped metal plates that cover most of the wearer's body. It includes arm and leg protection consisting of metal vambraces and greaves that are attached with leather straps.

entries.name: Special
entries: 如果穿戴者的力量值低于13，他们的速度会减少10英尺。

baseitem.name: Buckler
entries: 一个小盾牌，大约有板块大小，由金属制成，用一只手拿着。挥舞盾牌可使你的护甲等级提高1。你一次只能从一个盾牌中受益。

entries.name: Special
entries: 在挥舞这面盾牌时，你能够用两只手来攻击具有多面性的武器。此外，你可以用你的反应将你的熟练度加到你的AC上，以对抗一次会击中你的近战攻击；要做到这一点，你必须看到攻击者并且正在挥舞着这个扣子。

baseitem.name: Tower Shield
entries: 一个高大的盾牌，几乎有一个人那么大，由坚固的木头或金属制成，用一只手拿着。挥舞盾牌可以使你的护甲等级提高2级，你一次只能从一个盾牌中受益。

entries.name: Special
entries: 在挥舞这个盾牌的时候，如果你受到的效果允许你做一个灵巧的救赎，只受到一半的伤害，你可以使用你的反应，如果你救赎成功，就不会受到伤害，在你和效果的来源之间插入你的盾牌。
此外，如果你在你的回合中移动不超过你的移动速度的一半，你在挥舞此盾牌时，对远程攻击算作处于半掩护状态。
如果穿戴者的力量值低于15，他们的速度会减少10英尺。

baseitem.name: Draconite Bolt
entries: 用一种奇怪的材料制成的弩箭，具有奇怪的炼金术特性。每当你用这种弹药击中一个物体时，在你的攻击目标30英尺范围内的每个对你友好的生物都会恢复{@dice 2d4}的命中率。

item.name: Draconite Cleanser
entries: 一个起源于古怪的炼金术的炸弹。作为一个动作，你可以点燃炸弹并将其扔向60英尺以外的一个点。在该点10英尺范围内的每个生物必须成功地进行灵巧救赎（DC等于8加你的熟练度加你的灵巧修饰），否则会受到{@dice 3d4}火灾伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。
之后的1分钟内，每一个在选择点10英尺范围内的对你友好的生物在他们的回合开始时都会恢复（%0%）的命中率。

item.name: Fire Flask
entries: 一个简单的玻璃烧瓶，里面装着炽热的、挥发性的液体。你可以在你的回合内将这瓶易燃液体扔到60英尺以外的一个点上，作为一个动作。在所选地点10英尺范围内的每个生物都必须在一个灵巧救赎中成功（DC等于8加你的熟练度加你的灵巧修饰），否则会受到{@dice 5d4}火灾伤害。拯救成功后，伤害会减半。
火焰会点燃该区域内任何没有被穿戴或携带的易燃物，并持续到你下一回合结束。在此期间进入该区域的生物必须做一个DC13的灵巧救赎，否则会受到{@dice 3d6}的火力伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

item.name: Fire Trap
entries: 一小部分黑火药被可燃液体包围，外壳上面有一块压板。你可以在地面上设置陷阱作为一个动作。踩在压板上的生物和5英尺范围内的其他生物必须在DC13灵巧救赎中成功，否则会受到{@dice 5d4}的火力伤害。拯救成功后，伤害会减半。
火焰会点燃该区域内任何没有被穿戴或携带的易燃物，并持续到触发生物的下一回合结束。在此期间进入该区域的生物必须做一个DC13的灵巧救赎，否则会受到{@dice 3d6}的火焰伤害。如果救赎成功，则伤害减半。

item.name: Nail Bomb
entries: 一小部分黑火药被许多金属钉子包围，上面有一个压力板。你可以将炸弹放在地上作为一个动作。踩在压板上的生物和5英尺范围内的任何其他生物必须在DC15灵巧救赎中成功，否则会受到{@dice 4d4}的穿刺伤害。
未能通过灵巧救赎的生物在下一回合开始时会受到额外的（%0%）坏死性伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

item.name: Pugno Mortis
entries: 一个粗糙的黑火药炸弹。作为一个动作，你可以点燃一个黑火药炸弹并将其扔向60英尺以外的地方。在该点5英尺范围内的每个生物必须成功地进行灵巧救赎（DC等于8加你的熟练度加你的灵巧修饰），否则会受到{@dice 3d6}火灾伤害。拯救成功后，伤害减半。

item.name: Smoke Bomb
entries: 一个小球体，旨在撞击时爆炸，遮蔽人的逃生或生物的混乱。作为一个动作，你可以将烟雾弹扔向地面，在撞击时发出一团烟雾，在10英尺范围内形成一个严重遮蔽的区域。中等风（至少每小时10英里）在4个回合内驱散烟雾；强风（每小时20英里或以上）在1个回合内驱散。

item.name: Steel Plates
entries: 一套金属板，如护臂和护胫，旨在加强轻型盔甲的防御。如果你穿上这些钢板，同时穿着轻甲或无甲，并且不使用盾牌，你的AC值会增加1。

item.name: Death Whistle
entries: A small ceramic skull shaped whistle, capable of producing a chilling shrill sound akin to that of a dying shriek.

As an action you may blow the death whistle, each hostile creature that is within 30 feet of you and aware of you must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of you for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the Death Whistle for the next 24 hours.

entries.name: Hidden
entries: 你对隐藏这把武器的灵巧性（手的灵活性）检查具有优势。

entries.name: Monk Weapon
entries: 具有这种属性的武器包括在你可以使用和尚武术特征的武器中，和尚除了精通其他武器外，还精通这种武器。
